title: Jellymanium
description: A new children's chapter book for ages 7 to 10!When a wild ride through a jelly-filled pipe lands him inside the famous Jellymanium factory, Egbert and ninety-nine other kids find themselves competing to tour the factory and create a wonderful new flavor. After meeting Jellymanium’s president, a crazy jelly creature named Agarfunkle, Egbert surprisingly wins the contest, tours the amazing factory, and creates his very own custom flavor. But, when the secret jelly ingredients suddenly run out, he’ll have to go on three adventures through the deepest ocean trench, a searing volcano, and icy Antarctica in search of these priceless materials. With the help of Agarfunkle and his assistant, Gerald, Egbert will have to succeed in his quests if he ever hopes to have his jelly made.
author: Lucy Joffy
